instavm/clickclickclick

Controls Android and macOS through LLMs

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Controls computers and Android devices with LLMs
  • Menu bar app to run local LLMs on a Mac
  • local desktop sandbox that lets LLMs click, type, and screenshot on your machine
  • Android auto clicker with image detection for automating repetitive tasks
  • Emulates scroll wheel clicks on trackpads
  • Chat with multiple LLMs on Android
  • Turns touchpad or touchscreen gestures into custom desktop actions on Linux
  • customize mouse and trackpad settings on macOS
  • Finds ClickFix and FakeCAPTCHA campaigns
  • Self-hostable chat UI for LLMs with RAG and web search
